title: Is technology a means to an end or an end in itself? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology is a tool. Therefore, technology is a means to an end. e.g. A hammer is an artifact of technology used as a means to hit things, typically a nail into place; another example, artificial intelligence is a tool used to gain new information.

This answer is opinion. There presently are technology developmental institutions, example, Silicon Valley, that believe that technology is the end in itself. Earthly humans are no longer respectfully regarded as “human autonomous thinking beings.” Technological goal is attempting “ to create” a human brain that will become generically (robotically) technologically dependent. Such technological goal exists both as a means to an end, as well as, an end in itself.
